Control Name: 3.7.7 Some tests are performed in production.
Control Statement: While the majority of testing should be performed within the testing and staging environments, it is often beneficial to also run a subset of tests against the production system.

control_attributes.Control_Clause: 3.7 How are you testing to ensure that you workload can appropriately handle user load?
